sentences.english: Very few gas-powered passenger cars can beat the Chevy Volt off the line.
sentences.chinese: 燃油动力的乘用车很少能打败雪佛兰伏特。

sentences.english: The two plants inChachoengsao -- at Ban Pho and Gateway -- make passenger cars.
sentences.chinese: 在北柳府万坡县的两个工厂生产乘用车。
印度乘用车市场分析报告。

sentences.english: The interior low frequency noise of passenger car has direct influence on its comfort.
sentences.chinese: 乘用车的车内低频噪声直接影响其乘座舒适性。

sentences.english: Sales of passenger cars rose by roughly 20% in the first quarter.
sentences.chinese: 公司第一季度的乘用车销量增幅约为20%。
